mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISH(WISHSEQ, USERSEQ, PRODUCTSEQ) VALUES (WISHSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userseq}, #{productseq})
mapper.select: SELECT W.WISHSEQ, P.PRODUCTSEQ, U.USERSEQ, P.PRODUCTNAME, P.THUMBIMG, P.ADDRESS, P.TELLNUMBER, P.PRICE FROM WISH W, PTSD_USER U, PRODUCT P WHERE U.USERSEQ = W.USERSEQ AND W.PRODUCTSEQ = P.PRODUCTSEQ ORDER BY WISHSEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISH WHERE USERSEQ = #{userseq} AND PRODUCTSEQ = #{productseq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH WHERE USERSEQ = #{userseq} AND PRODUCTSEQ = #{productseq}
